text: Oh okay, you’ve got quite a mixture of different subjects then! Which is your favourite? Okay, have you managed to get any shadowing experience to see what physiotherapists roles are? Yeah that’s true, learning a language definitely makes it easier to work abroad in the future if you wanted to! Just be mindful that a large majority of physiotherapy isn’t sports related, there are a lot of different fields you can go into
Do you do any sports at the moment?

My favourite subject is PE, I haven’t had any chance to shadow anybody yet but I am hoping to do some once I finish school. I currently do swimming and horse riding, but I also enjoy sailing as well! What sort of physiotherapy are you looking at?
